archimate:Driver.name: Quality
archimate:Driver.documentation: The "quality" driver prioritizes excellence in products, services, and processes within an organization. It guides the focus towards high standards, precision, and reliability, ensuring that outcomes meet or exceed expectations. This driver is instrumental in shaping quality assurance policies, continuous improvement practices, and customer satisfaction strategies. It influences the adoption of meticulous design principles, thorough testing protocols, and robust quality control measures. The emphasis on quality leads to a culture that values attention to detail, consistency in performance, and a commitment to delivering superior value to customers and stakeholders.
